text: Koma yense amene amanena kwa makolo ake kuti, “Asa! Kodi inu muli kundilonjeza kuti ine ndidzaukitsidwa pamene mibadwo ina yambiri idapita kale ine ndisanabadwe?” Ndipo iwo amapempha chithandizo cha Mulungu nati, “Tsoka kwa iwe! Khulupirira! Ndithudi lonjezo la Mulungu ndi loona.” Koma iye amati, “Ichi si chinthu china koma nkhani zachabe za anthu amakedzana.”
